content: this pattern is also available for free here https //spinayarncrochet com/tyrannosaurus-rex-free-crochet-pattern/ meet timothee when worked in worsted weight yarn timothee measures approximately 23cm/9 tall and 27cm/10 wide however this pattern can be worked in any size yarn simply adjust your hook size accordingly the pattern is worked in flat panels which are then crocheted together the pdf includes the bonus patterns for the holiday accessories
